oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Renfro Valley Barn Dance - 1948-05-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Renfro Valley Barn Dance program, 1949-05-01, part 2, as recorded by WLAC, Nashville, TN. Featuring host John Lair with performers Old Joe Clark, Jerry Behrens, Gabe Tucker, and Pee Wee Wade Baker. Also featuring Roy (last name unknown). Sponsored by Ballard & Ballard.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jerry Behrens; Gabe Tucker; Old Joe Clark; Pee Wee Wade Baker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: John Lair introduces Jerry Behrens -- Blue Yodel No. 4 (California Blues) (Jerry Behrens vocals) -- John Lair introduces Gabe Tucker -- Comedy routine (Gabe Tucker) -- John Lair introduces Old Joe Clark -- I'm Thinking Tonight Of My Blue Eyes (Old Joe Clark vocals, banjo) -- Ballard & Ballard commercial (John Lair) -- John Lair introduces Pee Wee Wade Baker -- Foggy River (Pee Wee Wade Baker vocals)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Renfro Valley Barn Dance (Radio program); WHAS (Radio station : Louisville, Ky.); WLAC (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Renfro Valley Barn Dance (Radio program); Lair, John; Clark, Old Joe; Behrens, Jerry; Tucker, Gabe; Baker, Wade
